description:
### General
Cocuun is an application for managing projects, render services, communicate in teams or with external partners and share documents or information with other members.
It gives more order, transparency and a better overview for all members.
A simple digital rights management ensure that documents and information be available accurately.

[more about Cocuun](https://www.cocuun.net/)

### Supported Systems
Windows (7, 8, 8.1, 10)

### Features
-	Messaging
-	Collaboration
-	Shared Cloud-Storage
-	Digitization of Processes
-	Security made in Germany
-	Centrally Administration
-	DSGVO compliant
summary: Solution for agile management of orders, tasks, projects, processes and documents.
author: EXEC IT Solutions GmbH
